name: Solar Battle Glargaz
description:
The Glargaz solar system was the perfect place to build new worlds for settlers and expand the empire, until the attacks began. Being new settlements the planets defenses are still in the process of powering up, this is where you come in. Defend the planets from relentless attacks and provide time for the shield generators to power up, making the planets self sufficient. Solar Battle Glargaz provides endless levels of increasing difficulty to test even the most agile gamer. Ready for the test? Pick up a mouse and defend the Glargaz solar system!

Features:
Endless levels
Endless increasing difficulty
3 Difficulty settings
Simple but challenging game play
